Text: Thanks for that upload! But it asks for a password when I put it in the radio... Does anyone knows a password?
The password when the radio asks is PASSWORDPASSWORD all caps no spaces

has anyone figured out the install process?  I figured out to unrar the file and place the contents of SD1 on the root of an SD card, load into device and it prompts to install.. however "PASSWORDPASSWORD" does not work... HELP HELP!
U need to load a patched update before this. It's all documented on avic411 forum.
